settings.heading: SHOW YOUR SKIN THE LOVE IT DESERVES
settings.title: Peels
settings.body: There comes a time when even your favorite skincare products are not as effective as they once were. This is due to your skin’s cells accumulating damage, debris, and toxins from the environment. Balanced Aesthetics Medspa can refresh your skin for a bright, radiant complexion that will have you feeling like a whole new person.

settings.text: With our 3 peel choices, anyone can benefit. The O2 Peel is suitable even for expectant mothers. If you’re looking for a way to breathe some life into your complexion, the peels at Balanced Aesthetics Medspa are a fantastic treatment with real results. Be sure to relay your dermatological history and any medications, including topical, that you have taken in the last 30 days during your consultation.

Oxygen refreshes tired or dull skin, and minimizing pigmentation and acne can give your skin a natural glow that looks effortless. You’ll look relaxed and bright-eyed with noticeable radiance. Repeated treatments over time can minimize toxins, build your collagen network, and keep your skin healthy and balanced. There’s no other feeling like it, and Balanced Aesthetics Medspa can give it to you with any of our peels.

settings.question: How Do Peels Work?
settings.answer:
At Balanced Aesthetics Medspa, we offer 3 distinctive peels.

O2 FACIAL: THE LUNCHTIME PEEL

The ingredients of the O2 Facial are what set this luxurious treatment apart. A high concentration of enzymatic botanicals, peptides, and plant-derived stem cells infuse oxygen into your skin to renew and refresh your complexion. Oxygen improves circulation, which speeds healing and brings necessary nutrients to the tissues, so your skin is better able to fight toxins and free radicals.

The O2 Peel:

• Oxygenates the tissues

• Clears away impurities and blemishes

• Purifies clogged pores

• Improves collagen production

• Reduces dullness

• Infuses skin with stem cells, peptides, and enzymes

• Softens textures

• Contains a low pH for little to no downtime

• Is suitable for all skin types, and even pregnant or nursing mothers

THE PERFECTION PEEL

Visibly diminish fine lines and wrinkles, smooth rough textures and uneven tones, and reduce blemishes with the Perfection Peel. Its blend of lactic and salicylic acids, resorcinol, and exfoliating agents are the next generation of skin revitalization for mature skin, acne breakouts, and pigmentation issues.

The Perfection Peel:

• Repairs moderate-to-severe acne

• Reverses signs of aging

• Diminishes pigmentation concerns

THE BHA PEEL

The BHA Peel (for beta hydroxy acid) uses salicylic acid to exfoliate your skin and clear away congested pores. Because the active ingredients are oil-soluble, the BHA Peel is ideal for clearing up breakouts smoothing your skin’s texture and fine lines. It can also diffuse redness at the skin’s surface.

The BHA Peel:

• Goes deep in the pores to clear dead skin and sebum

• Reverses sun damage

• Reduces redness and rosacea

• Balances your skin’s pH level

settings.question: What Do Peels Feel Like?
settings.answer: The O2 Facial is more pampering than peeling. The Perfection Peel and the BHA Peel are a little more intense. Your Balanced Aesthetics provider will ensure you’re comfortable with topical anesthetic, and your peel is applied for the prescribed length of time. Once the time is up, the acids are neutralized, and your skin is soothed with carefully chosen products for your specific skin concerns.

settings.question: Is There Any Downtime?
settings.answer: After an O2 Peel, we recommend not touching your skin or applying makeup or heavy skin products for at least 4-6 hours. The Perfection Peel and BHA Peel will involve detailed aftercare instructions to care for your skin for the following 3-5 days.
